content: कटुक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Sharp, pungent. {@--2@} Impetuous, hot. {@--3@} Disagreeable, unpleasant. {@--4@} Fierce. {@--5@} Harsh. --कः {@--1@} Pungency, acerbity. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of several plants:-- पटोल, सुगंधितृण, कुटज, अर्क, राजसर्षप. --का <ab>N.</ab> of several plants: --कटुरोहिणी, तांबूली, राजिका, तिक्तालाबुक. --की = कटुरोहिणी. --कं {@--1@} Pungency; (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab> in a bad sense; as दधिकटुकं ‘bad curds).’ {@--2@} A compound of ginger, black and long pepper.
